website_summaries.verdict: If you need a large amount of durable tent spikes for a reasonable price, this 2-pack is a great money-saving deal.
pros: Each topped with a rope hook
cons: Not the best solution for extra-hard or frozen ground

customer_reviews.title: Hold great in soft soil
customer_reviews.text: They're plastic tent pegs so they're not intended to be pounded into hard or frozen ground. The 9" length would be plenty for most locations near me but I'm planning some beach camping and wanted some extra hold in the sand. These should work nicely. The plastic can be somewhat brittle so be careful when pounding them with a hammer (a rubber dead-blow mallet recommended).
customer_reviews.author: amazon-shopper

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what the people are complaining about unless ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the people are complaining about unless they're trying to drive the stakes into concrete. I am a avid turkey and deer hunter have 5 double bull blinds each one of them staked down with these stakes and never or a blind collapse I live on the eastern shore of Virginia real close to the ocean we're 20 and 30 mile an hour winds or comment as a cold and these Stakes did their job very very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronbear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing when used on the appropriate surfaces.
customer_reviews.text: These stakes are incredibly strong. Of course they are designed for sand n soil that is soft to medium-hard. I used them in medium grass soil. I can't imagine how people break these unless the are using them on very hard soil/rock where skinny metal should b used and/or people are miss hitting these w a hammer. I use a mallot and when they go in they are staying.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I got these to use at the beach to hold down out tend because nothing will give you a heart attack faster then the wind hitting your shade tend with your baby in it and realizing the stakes that came with it can't hold the tent down. Even on a windy day these stakes will hold the tent in place.
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Use the right tool for the right job!
customer_reviews.text: To all the complainers about how these plastic pegs break: you're misusing the peg. Use plastic pegs in medium to soft ground and metal pegs in hard ground. Then these plastic pegs will last a lifetime. Would you use the front end of your car to dismantle a brick wall?
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Went to coachella 2018 first weekend, winds ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong. Went to coachella 2018 first weekend, winds were relentless from noon to 8pm at night. On top of this, one side of my 10x10 canopy was bending in from the force of the wind. Used 5 of these stakes to tie down my entire canopy and tents. The whole thing wouldn't budge nad was very secure. Saw countless canopies next to our camp fly away to the same gusts that were hitting us.
customer_reviews.author: jannnnjannnn

customer_reviews.title: Can Pegs be too Secure?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dry conditions, but you will need to be VERY strong if you want to remove these pegs from clay or moist, wet soil. They go deep and can be very difficult to remove. These pegs are sturdy and probably strong enough to make you tent stay up in hurricane force winds. Of course the fabric would be ripped to shreds, but the pegs would be secure.
customer_reviews.author: IA Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Not only do they ship the package in a flimsy bag but when it arrived it only had (4) four of (12) twelve tent stakes. The ones I received however were of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Printz

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach stakes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as replacements for the thin metal anchors provided for my beach tent. They work much better! After staking them down, I pour water over the sand to help provide better holding.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Good stakes for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are tent stakes...they do what they were designed to do. I wouldn’t try hunting vampires with them, but they work fine holding tents in place
customer_reviews.author: David Dewees

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I received a flimsy soft mailer with only 4 Tent Pegs instead of the 2x packs of 6 that I ordered. There was no retail packaging and I am currently waiting to hear back from Vetmed USA for a customer service response. I have purchased these tent pegs before and they work great, I have no issue with the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: FiveThreeEcho

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are longer than the 9 inch pegs that came with my Ozark Trail Weather Burster 9 Man Tent. I have not used them but I think they will hold pretty nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ebipabo Fred

customer_reviews.title: Good for tents.... Great for "Tombstones"
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep Halloween "Tombstones" in the ground. Worked great, glued them on with Gorilla glue and when I pulled them up all were still attached ... next year no more falling tombstones.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Nader

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: We use these stakes to hold down the bottom edge of our fence line to keep the coyotes from digging under. They are longer and more study than others I’ve tried. I’m actually on my fourth pack now as I’m replacing all the ones I had bought from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak Steve

customer_reviews.title: What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to secure my umbrella in the sand. Of course 12 is way too many but I'll use them for camping too.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty John

customer_reviews.title: did a great job keeping our tent up - no issues at ...
customer_reviews.text: did a great job keeping our tent up - no issues at all! It's nice that they're yellow so they are easily seen.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F.

customer_reviews.title: Scam -Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! SCAM!!!! Description says 2 packs of 6 stakes. I received 2 stakes. Yes, only two. Now I have to go through the inconvenience of driving to UPS to drop them for a return. Save your time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B Dankwardt

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my beach camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my beach camping trip. I twisted and pushed these into the sand by hand. I think they would have broke if I used a mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: holds my fence down for my dogs so they can't dig out
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Milstead

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on these
customer_reviews.text: These stakes are incredibly flimsy. Without fail, every single one of these shattered when I attempted to drive them into the ground. Don't waste your money on these. Get some good metal stakes instead, they cost less and won't send shards of plastic all over the campsite.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just finishinh putting up decorations, length, and two ways of typing items down, outstanding product
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Extra Holding Power
customer_reviews.text: These stakes are very durable. I use them for extra holding power in softer soil.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Good price, well made
customer_reviews.text: Does what they have to do, nice price, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the pegs very juch. good length and light weight. Good value at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: AXerxes

customer_reviews.title: wrong ad
customer_reviews.text: there were only two pegs in the package. I didn't even have to open it to figure it out. just sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: avalon la rocca

product_meta.title: COGHLANS LTD. ABS TENT PEG 12 inches 2 Packs of 6 Pack
product_meta.description: 12 inch ABS plastic tent pegs in a 6-pack. These bright and easily seen tent stakes include a rugged design and no slip hook.
feature_bullets: Rugged design with great holding power
Bright yellow and easy to see

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
